channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Brinicle's Shopping Spree. The Piris try to change Brinicle's wasteful ways, but their recycling plan hits a snag.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Topsy and Tim
channel.desc: School Shoes. Live-action children's show. Topsy and Tim stomp around wearing their new school shoes. Topsy is so excited she can't sleep.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family Fun Shorts
channel.desc: George and Freddie's Pirate Adventure. George and Freddie pretend to be pirates and head to a nearby boating lake. But will they find any treasure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle and the Tooth Fairy. Preschool comedy drama series. Doug's tooth has fallen out, so Jess and Simon tell Waffle about the Tooth Fairy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Day and Night. A solar eclipse! That's definitely something to stay awake for.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Eat Green Banana and Saltfish. JoJo wants to bake banana loaf, but the bananas are too green.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Stories about Colly Wobble! Mr Onion reads everyone a book about how Colly Wobble likes to be very silly.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Planty. Stop-motion animation. The Clangers help Granny make her knitting space more special. Major makes her a fan and Mother gives her a purple plant from her garden.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Where Did Makka Pakka's Sponge Go? Children's programme. Makka Pakka trips over a stone, and his sponge flies off into Upsy Daisy's megaphone.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Lora Fachie - The Secret Code. Paralympic cyclist Lora Fachie reads a story about a boy reading in braille.
